bibl.title: From the African Psalter and Liturgy.
bibl.note: Text, transl., and comment. of the amulet P. Heid. Inv. L 5 (= C.P.L. 316; van Haelst 1213), stolen or destroyed in 1945. Text based on a copy made by Preisendanz of Guéraud's transcription combined with Preisendanz' revised readings. Fustat, V or V/VI c. Excerpts from Ps. 20 reflect the north Italian-African tradition of the Psalter.
bibl.seg: Daniel Robert W. and Franco Maltomini, From the African Psalter and Liturgy.

Text, transl., and comment. of the amulet P. Heid. Inv. L 5 (= C.P.L. 316; van Haelst 1213), stolen or destroyed in 1945. Text based on a copy made by Preisendanz of Guéraud's transcription combined with Preisendanz' revised readings. Fustat, V or V/VI c. Excerpts from Ps. 20 reflect the north Italian-African tradition of the Psalter.
